Name Rascal/Expressions/Values/List/insertAt

Function list[&T] insertAt(list[&T] lst, int n, &T elm) throws IndexOutOfBounds(int index)
Description Returns a new list with the value of elm inserted at index position n of the old list.
Examples 
rascal>import List;
ok
rascal>insertAt([1,2,3], 1, 5);
list[int]: [1,5,2,3]
